text:
The iPhone 17 Pro will reportedly not feature a ‘particularly bold new look’

The front will be ‘quite similar’ to the 16 Pro, however, the back will feature a new, larger camera design

Source: @markgurman

Full story: https://bloomberg.com/news/newsletters/2025-04-06/will-apple-raise-iphone-prices-in-the-us-after-trump-tariffs-iphone-17-details?cmpid=BBD040625_POWERON&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=250406&utm_campaign=poweron…
Similar? So the same as the 15, 14, 13, 12, 11
Sick of the caneras getting bigger

Well I guess the larger camera bump is the lesser of two evils.

I rather have that then the Spilt materials and two-toned iPhone.

Well the “front” has been quite similar for a while. Still good to see the back panel changing … 

I would have preferred the horizontal camera layout though, which was being rumoured earlier !!
Reality
I would really like to see some reduction in size to the Dynamic Island/notch. But I feel like they're waiting until the 20th edition anniversary of the iPhone 19 release to do that.
simplifying aesthetics and focusing on the camera makes sense
This back panel design is good. If the camera block were on black glass, it might have been even better.
Camera looks horrible.
